settings.content:
"Together We Make a Better World"

On this page you can read all about the core of what Awareness Avenue is - a jewelry brand with the world and its people at our heart.

Through our collections we support various global initiatives that aim to drive positive change for a brighter future for our planet and us - its people.

We aim to be completely transparent with our customers; as a result we have made our donations public so you can always see directly how your purchase impacts the world.

Below you will find downloadable monthly reports of our donation details.

Awareness Avenue started as a very small jewelry brand with a few inspirational pieces to help us aid Mental Health Awareness via the NAMI foundation. This was largely a success, but we realized we could have way more impact if we expanded our collections and initiatives.

Since then we've launched a lot more collections and served a lot more customers. In essence our Donations Program is about giving back. We could not be here without you. As such we decided to dedicate every single one of our pieces to a cause and make this a foundation of our brand.

This means whenever you purchase from our website, you directly help support global initiatives from Ocean Cleanup, Make a Wish, Diamonds for Peace and NAMI with more to come for future collections after 2023.

Our goal? To be more than just a jewelry brand, but a community where our customers become the benefactors of positive change for our world and its people.

Crafting more than jewelry â€” we forge symbols of hope, connection, and change.

Uniting elegance with purpose, we craft symbols that champion hope and spark change. Every piece embodies our dedication to global impact, turning jewelry into beacons for causes that reshape the world.

Together, we adorn the world with purpose and shine a light on causes that matter.

settings.question: How do I know I am getting the best value for money?
settings.answer:
We are committed to providing not just beautiful and ethically crafted jewelry, but also exceptional value.

We eliminate middlemen and retail markups, allowing us to offer premium quality jewelry at lower prices, all backed by a lifetime guarantee.

settings.question: Do you offer any guarantees?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer a lifetime guarantee on all our jewelry. This covers any potential defects in materials or workmanship, ensuring your piece remains as beautiful as the day you first wore it.

settings.question: Why are your prices so affordable?
settings.answer: Our direct-to-you model eliminates unnecessary retailer markups, allowing us to offer high-quality, beautifully crafted jewelry at fair prices. By controlling the entire process from production to purchase, we ensure that luxury is accessible to everyone without compromising on quality.

settings.question: Is financing available?
settings.answer: To make our jewelry even more accessible, we offer financing options through our partner ShopPay, allowing you to enjoy your purchase now and pay over time.

settings.question: How can I be sure the size will fit?
settings.answer: We provide a detailed sizing guide on our product pages, including instructions on how to measure your size accurately. If the fit isnâ€™t perfect, our easy exchange policy can help you find the right size.

settings.question: How is the jewelry ethical?
settings.answer: We use only lab-grown or ethically sourced stones. Our metals are high-quality recycled materials, wherever possible to minimize carbon footprint. Every moissanite item comes with GIA certification and tracing.

settings.question: What if I have allergies?
settings.answer: We understand the importance of skin-friendly jewelry. Our pieces are exclusively crafted using hypoallergenic metals, making them safe for sensitive skin. Everyone can wear our jewelry comfortably and without any concerns.
